bwwExcerpt: Combine early 20th-century Russian history with bits and pieces of 'Les Miz,' 'My Fair Lady' and 'Newsies,' and you've got 'Anastasia,' the uneven but well-meaning and mostly pleasant new Broadway musical based on the 1997 animated film of the same title from 20th Century Fox.
